question.body: After a meal is consumed you would expect:

multiple_choice.choice: Blood glucose to go up and insulin to go down.
Blood glucose to go up and insulin to go up.
Blood glucose to go down and glycogen to go down.
Blood glucose to go down and glycogen to go up.

response.feedback: Incorrect. After a meal the glucose from the meal will enter the blood stream and the blood glucose level will go up. Insulin will also go up to help lower the blood glucose level.
Correct. After a meal the glucose from the meal will enter the blood stream and the blood glucose level will go up. And insulin will be produced to lower the blood glucose level.
Incorrect. After a meal it is expected that blood glucose will go up as the glucose from the meal enters the blood stream.
Incorrect. After a meal it is expected that blood glucose will go up as the glucose from the meal enters the blood stream.
